00021 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(FiftyFifty)
00022 {
00023         ProbabilityNode* node = new ProbabilityNode();
00024         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0));
00025         node->addChild(new FailureAfter(0));
00026         int dummy_agent = 0;
00027         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00028 
00029         int successes = 0,failures = 0;
00030         for (int i = 0 ; i<10000 ; i++)
00031         {
00032                 switch (node->execute(&dummy_agent))
00033                 {
00034                 case BT_FAILURE: failures++;  break;
00035                 case BT_SUCCESS: successes++; break;
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 
00039         if (max(failures,successes) > 5100)
00040                 BOOST_FAIL("questionable statistical distribution");
00041 
00042         delete node;
00043 }
00044 
00045 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(WithWeights1)
00046 {
00047         ProbabilityNode* node = new ProbabilityNode();
00048         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0),9);
00049         node->addChild(new FailureAfter(0),1);
00050         int dummy_agent = 0;
00051         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00052 
00053         int successes = 0,failures = 0;
00054         for (int i = 0 ; i<10000 ; i++)
00055         {
00056                 switch (node->execute(&dummy_agent))
00057                 {
00058                 case BT_FAILURE: failures++;  break;
00059                 case BT_SUCCESS: successes++; break;
00060                 }
00061         }
00062 
00063         if (failures < 950 || failures > 1050 || successes < 8950|| successes > 9050)
00064                 BOOST_FAIL("questionable statistical distribution");
00065 
00066         delete node;
